item.title: Spring 2020
item.description: Problem statement: Given an arbitrary map consisting of a number of connected regions, find the shortest sequence of folds which ensures that every region overlaps every other region. Definitions: map - region - a continuous set of 2D points fold - a reflection operation that maps all points on one side of a given line to the other side. The operation can be formally described as: —- overlap - two regions overlap iff Deadline 13/03/2020 Colloquium 20/03/2020
